author: Juha Haataja
content:
Quite an impressive photograph you have here, a good demonstration of your analysis of the LX5.

Maybe this gives some credibility to the <a href="http://theonlinephotographer.typepad.com/the_online_photographer/2011/05/does-equipment-matter.html" rel="nofollow">Leica lenses posting at TOP, about "people who say they love the look of Leica lenses".
